title: DERMS Dispatch of a Virtual Power Plant (VPP)
description: A Distributed Energy Resource Management System (DERMS) needs to dispatch a VPP of residential batteries to help reduce evening peak load on a constrained feeder.

tasks.description: The DERMS forecasts a load-on-feeder that will exceed its thermal limit during the evening peak.
tasks.expected_outcome: System identifies a need for load reduction.

tasks.description: Identify the available capacity from the VPP of residential batteries located on that feeder.
tasks.expected_outcome: System confirms 500 kW of dispatchable capacity is available from the VPP.

tasks.description: Send a dispatch signal to the VPP, instructing the batteries to discharge for a two-hour period to reduce the peak load.
